content.value: Blankets for T.O. is a non-profit organization situated at the University of Toronto that strives to provide support and resources to those in need of housing across the Greater Toronto Area (GTA). We also advocate against the stigma associated with homelessness, with the ultimate goal of eradicating it. Our team has worked towards our goal by distributing food, blankets, hand sanitizers, and masks to those in need. We will continue to motivate others to help the homeless of our city and educate others on the severity of this issue. Links to our social media can be found on the
Learn more about the events, initiatives and donations that Blankets for T.O. organized during 2021 through our year end summary
Are you an organization, media entity, or public figure that wants to collaborate with or write about Blankets for T.O.?
Organizations, media and public figures wishing to work with Blankets for T.O. can contact us via our email:
. We are also happy to be contacted for interviews and articles!
